availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bullitt County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Kate S. Field. Father of Julia F. Field and Abram Field. Attorney in Bullitt County in 1850. Attorney in Bullitt County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, p. 213.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, Shepherdsville, p. 3.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, Shepherdsville, p. 21.
Find A Grave, "Richard H. Field (1823-1881)," Memorial #14091054, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/14091054 (accessed August 22, 2018).
